text: int rem [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int sum ( int a [ ] [ 100 ] , int i , int j , int n ) { int sum1 ; int sum2 ; int ans ; if ( i >= n ) return 0 ; if ( rem [ i + 1 ] [ j ] >= 0 ) { sum1 = a [ i ] [ j ] + rem [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; } else sum1 = a [ i ] [ j ] + sum ( a , i + 1 , j , n ) ; if ( rem [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] >= 0 ) { sum2 = a [ i ] [ j ] + rem [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } else sum2 = a [ i ] [ j ] + sum ( a , i + 1 , j + 1 , n ) ; ans = ( sum1 > sum2 ) ? sum1 : sum2 ; rem [ i ] [ j ] = ans ; return ans ; } int main ( ) { int n ; int i ; int j ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( ; t > 0 ; t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) rem [ i ] [ j ] = - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ( a , 0 , 0 , n ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
